Title: Simply Play Midi
Description: The simplest way to play a Midi music with Unity. No script is used, all is defined in the inspector.

Title: Play Midi with script
Description: How to integrate MPTK by script in your application. Use of the MPTK API with a few lines of code. Use of the MPTK API.

Title: Multi Midi Player
Description: Four MidiFilePlayer prefabs are defined on a 3D scene with the camera moving on each to experiment a simple spatialization function without spatializer!

Title: Midi File Loading
Description: Load all or part of the Midi events from Midi DB or from disk (Pro). No sequencer, no synthetizer, no music playing capabilities, just loading and decoding a Midi file to the more easy class MPTKEvent.

Title: Midi Stream Music
Description: How to generate real time music notes without any Midi files with a few lines of code. Moreover, with the Pro version, plays chords and ranges, applies real time parameters change as attack, effect, and others.

Title: Catch Music
Description: Notes ares read from a MidiFilePlayer and fall on a belt convoyor. At the end, they are playing with MidiStreamPlayer. Unfortunatelys,  some monsters come to disturb the music! Could become a game!

Title: Midi Spatialization
Description: An erratic sphere playing Midi music for experimenting the Spatialization function. Set spatialization mode in Unity to have a good experience!

Title: Midi Play List
Description: Play a list of Midi or part of Midi with time overlap between them .

Title: Euclidean Rhythm
Description: An interesting and original algo to generate rhythms. Also: interactive synthesizer parameters change by user and real time event (OnAudioFrameStart) for a very accurate music generator.
Script: TestEuclideanRhythme.cs\nSee EuclideSeq folder for all source code.

Title: Generate Midi from API
Description: Create, write to disk or play a Midi with an  easy to use API set.

Title: Generate Midi from UI
Description: Create, write to disk or play a Midi from a grapical keyboard. It's  an ultra light music sequencer!!! Do you want to continue this project ?

Title: Play External Midi
Description: Select Midi files from your desktop or from a Web site and play them. See the amazing roulette midi :)

Title: Channel Spatialization
Description: Each instrument/channel get a 3D position. You can fly between them and locate each.  Set spatialization mode in Unity to have a good experience!

Title: Read Midi Keyboard
Description: Read Midi events from a connected midi keyboard. Need to install a plugins available on the web site. This demo is using a prefab.

Title: Read / Write Midi Keyboard
Description: Read Midi events from a connected midi keyboard. Need to install a plugins available on the web site. This demo is using the base class.
